article.title: Ethiopia Taxation And Regulation
article.description: Ethiopian Revenue and Customs Authority (ERCA) is the main tax administration body responsible for collecting taxes and ensuring compliance with tax laws in Ethiopia. The tax system in Ethiopia is a dual system, with both the federal government and regional governments having the authority to levy taxes. The federal government taxes income, profits, property, and goods and services. Regional governments tax land, buildings, and certain types of businesses.
